title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Beat the eggs in a bowl and mix with grated Parmesan.
Drain the pasta and quickly mix with pancetta and egg mixture.
Serve with extra Parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with spices and yogurt for 2 hours.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
Prepare the sauce by simmering tomato sauce with spices.
Add the chicken to the sauce and stir in heavy cream.
Serve with rice or naan bread.
